alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 2:16PM EST until March 12 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie, Southern Erie and Crawford counties. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow develops Friday night as a cold front moves across the region. Colder air spills across Lake Erie by sunrise Saturday with the expectation that lake effect snow will develop. The hilltops from northeastern Erie County to northern Crawford County should see the highest amounts. Gusty winds will cause blowing and drifting of the snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
